Header.Name: SoftShare
Header.Subject: New Customer ID
Header.Suggestion: In the VAN Setup task, add a note "Emailed Softshare" and mark it as completed.

ScribTemplate.Template: Hello,[$$:BR][$$:BR]Please add the new customer [$:CUSTOMER_NAME] ID [$:CUSTOMER_QUALIFIER]/ [$:CUSTOMER_EDI_ID] to TrueCommerce AS2 interconnect.[$$:BR][$$:BR]Thank you,[$$:BR]
